website_summaries.verdict: A simple but useful ladder that does not break the budget.
pros: Ladder is a little shorter (38") than others on the market, making it an easier fit for many trampolines
Fits snug and is ready to use quickly
Great for giving young children an easier way to get on the trampoline
cons: Double check the height of your trampoline
If yours is too high, this ladder might not reach the ground

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with Skywalker 15'
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this ladder for our 15' Skywalker trampoline and it works perfectly. I love that it has wider steps so it doesn't hurt little ones feet. It took maybe 5 minutes to put it together and makes getting in and out so much easier on the kids.
customer_reviews.author: MermaidK

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I agree with what others have already said about the assembly instruction. It takes big effort to make simple things so confusing and complicated!!! Just look at the parts, you will figure it out. In any case, should not complain too much at this price point. It does what we need. Works well for our Skywalker 12-Feet Jump N' Dunk Trampoline. Tip: I have placed the ladder between a post and zipper of the safety net so that one has something to grab onto when getting in and out of the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Gammaworks

customer_reviews.title: Hard Assembly
customer_reviews.text: There are no tools required for assembly, but the steps are a hard plastic and the legs are metal. There are grooves on the legs and these plastics brackets are supposed to just fit perfectly and the steps slide onto the brackets...nope. I got one step fully connected with considerable force. The other just doesn’t fit. I got one half of that step onto a bracket and the other half is free. And yes, I did everything in the order and orientation described in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hig

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this. Our trampoline didn't come with a ladder and we were using a stool before to help our kids get on and off. We have a 2 year old and 4 year old that LOVE our trampoline. This ladder has been great, especially for my 2 year old who needed help getting before the ladder. They can climb up and down it easily. Seems sturdy and well made. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor T.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sturdy. Wouldn’t put 300 pounds on it, but seeing how it’s for the trampoline that shouldn’t be an issue. The foam bits at the bottom I don’t quite get. They just get muddy in our yard. Maybe it helps the bar not sink into the ground as fast? Definitely recommend and definite improvement over the little wooden step we were using that constantly got knocked over. Only thing better was trying to watch my littles wiggle their little butts up when there was nothing and they had to climb in. These should seriously come with the trampoline itself. Buy it if you’re not sure, you’ll be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Great as a ladder over a desert view fence !!!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Arizona with our backyard backed up against a beautiful desert with walking and hiking trails between mountains. Between us and the desert is a metal view fence. We used to drive to a hiking trail start about a mile away to take a 6-26 mile hike which stretches behind our yard, but then I found this diddy !!!! It fit beautifully over our railing, hooked on so we can "jump our fence" and then on the way back we simply lift it up and switch it over so we can enter our backyard just as easily as we left. GREAT FIND and fantastic way to improvise a trampoline ladder !
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to assemble, great for its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of the ladder, the height is perfect for the trampoline, the steps are so much more comfortable than the Skywalker 3 step ladder, but the assembly was horrible! The instructions are useless, and my husband finally muscled the "step lock housings" into the steps themselves-- still not sure they're in there correctly but they seems sturdy enough. I took a photo of the two ladders we've tried side by side- this one and the Skywalker 3 step ladder. This one is shorter and much easier to use. Just horrible to assemble, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: family of 6

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids 14ft trampoline and it works great. I like the fact that they are actual flat steps so it doesnt hurt there feet. Like most of the other reviews have said, the instructions are garbage, but if you look at the pictures an use your best judgement its super easy to put together. I would 100% buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie jones

customer_reviews.title: Weird assembly, but great overall
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on this ladder were a little difficult to follow initially, but once you kind of figure out which pieces generally go where it becomes easier to follow. Overall once the ladder is constructed, it is extremely sturdy and snaps onto the trampoline very easily. If I had one gripe/suggestion, I would have gladly paid an extra couple of bucks to not have to put this together myself. The ladder isn't so large as to justify it coming in multiple pieces like it did. WORTH THE PURCHASE THOUGH!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to use for the younger ones
customer_reviews.text: I got this gift for a 2 year old who loves to go on his big brothers trampoline but can never get on it unless he gets help from someone. Was easy to install and the 2yr old can easily get up and down on his own. He absolutely loves this thing and so do we. It's like he got a new trampoline for Christmas. Hehe. Needless to say, his older brother is not too happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: chiho bauske

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works as described...we have a Jump Zone 14’ diameter trampoline. Pretty easy to assemble...once you figure out how to hold the curves rails just right, to get the steps to fit on. :) Wish the steps were a bit wider; we used to use a small step ladder before we bought this...which got super hot because of the material, but the wider steps were a little easier on your feet. We have the opening of our trampoline net (and these stairs) close to one of the upright support poles, so it can be used as a handrail when climbing the stairs if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Works, Lightweight, Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: This is not the robust jumpoline ladder, but it does the trick. It sure is easier than using a milk crate or step stool to get on and off the jumpoline. Do check to make sure this ladder is tall enough for your particular jumpoline. We have a Sky Zone XL by Vuly and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: I love that the latter hooks on to the trampoline!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids had a small step latter in front of the trampoline to get on and off, I watched way too many times as they almost broke their heads open falling off that ladder. I love that this ladder hooks right on to the trampoline so it doesn't move as they are using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to assemble - still not together!
customer_reviews.text: This was so difficult to assemble that it's actually not entirely put together! It's literally on our trampoline with just a top step and the bottom is all the way at the ground. Very disappointing. Even our kids have mentioned how much they miss our old one (a slide-type made of material similar to trampoline material. we had it for 4 years until the sun made the material weak and it ripped) we should have just bought the same one we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Parsons fam

customer_reviews.title: Chunk instructions, its really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are way more complex than they need to be. Pictures arent helpful. Basically put steps on so the slant is outwards then add foam to the bottom and connect the ladder ends, now put the plastic pieces onto the ladder (they are slit up one side, skinny part up), slide and lock onto where they go on the ladder then slide step downward onto it and turn to lock (when you cant turn it anymore). Hook onto trampoline. Test. Easy. Metal frame, solid plastic steps. Much safer and easier to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: AngieC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a 15” trampoline put it all together then realized it’s too tall for my kids to climb onto, the website where I got the trampoline was selling them for way more, then lucky found it on here and order right away. It’s pretty easy to put together fits right on and it’s pretty sturdy, I tested it couple times climbing up and down to make sure if it breaks it happens to me and not the kids. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Senada2006

customer_reviews.title: Great design; non-slip design
customer_reviews.text: We've had this since Christmas and our 2 year old can easily get on and off our trampoline without any help with this ladder. I love that it's safe even if wet. The steps have grips on them to help keep them non-slip. Everyone needs these for their trampoline. It makes it easy for dh and I to get on and off the trampoline as well. No awkward climbing on and off. It has C-hooks to hook on to the side of the trampoline under the mat. I've never felt it slide or shift while climbing on or off.
customer_reviews.author: MB_Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is perfect! It looks great along with being fully functional. The assembly is pretty straight forward once common sense is applied. Do not count on using the manual to help, it left more confusion than being helpful. The images are too dark in contrast to understand what the image is showing/pointing out. I installed the ladder on my 12 ft PowerSport trampoline and it fits like a glove. I did use self tapping screws to secure the ladder to the trampoline by using the pre-drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Heintzman

customer_reviews.title: if you dont like fighting with install, avoid..
customer_reviews.text: the metal pieces you need to slip together dont line up properly. so my husband had to muscle the thing (shredding the metal) to get them connected. it took a while. this thing would be sooo easy to put together if the attention to detail to make sure the angles of the metal pieces, were correct. they wouldnt even go all the way but it should stay together-hopefully. didnt want to go through the pain of returning. install easy, slips right on to trampoline rim.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: All in all this ladder has been great but here are some of the issues I had with it and why I only gave it 3 stars. It was pretty difficult to put together. My husband even had a hard time with getting everything on. Also the sturdiness isn’t that great. It’s for my 3 year old so for her it’s okay but anyone who has bigger kids I wouldn’t buy. It does slide on very easy to the trampoline. Over all it’s serving it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Welbaum

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was the biggest pain n the butt trying to hook together and once we got it together someone weighting 100# stepped on it an the plastic cracked my trampoline holds 350# id hope a step ladder for a trampoline could hold up a 100# person edit: the entire bottom step broke off and it’s only been kids under 100# to step on it I’m super sad about this
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany White

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: Like others, our tramp. was too tall for my little one to get on easily. This one does the job. It was very easy to assemble. Not sure why so many others had a hard time of it. The instructions are pretty clear. I dinged it one star because after my two oldest get on it and bounce for a while, the "hooks" sometimes come off. Perhaps it's not the bouncing, but the way they are entering? I wouldn't be surprised. But, I would still recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Moomie

customer_reviews.title: Still looks good
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons trampoline years ago, and still looks great. Had not had a ton of wear and tear from sun or other outdoor elements. I would buy this brand again for future needs.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear23

customer_reviews.title: Great for trampolines
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase any assistance on getting onto my trampoline but this was a necessary buy. Very sturdy. I am 180 lbs and I feel supported using this. I climb up like real stairs. No hands.
customer_reviews.author: Reece G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just barely fit our Skywalker 15 foot trampoline, but snaps in well. Survived a weekend of a bunch of kids running and jumping up and down the stairs. I was a little skeptical at first that the steps would support their suggested weight, but once I put them together correctly I was able to stand on the steps myself with my son (combined ~240 lbs). Only problem is actually putting them together correctly. It was pretty simple to figure out, but getting them into place correctly took a couple of attempts. Otherwise worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Zapp

customer_reviews.title: You want it you need it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ladder & the black matches my trampoline perfectly. It was a bit of a twat to put together but I might have just been tipsy. 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together but when I finally understood the first step the ladder went together quickly. The ladder has been holding up great with 4 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: ladder fits great perfect addition to trampoline so nice and good price
customer_reviews.text: ladder fits great perfect addition to trampoline so nice and good price.. seems sturdy as well. about 15 mins to put together..... yes as others have said the instructions worthless just put together on your own.. read them quickly just to get any important safety information thats a must.. other than that the pictures are not great. ladder once put on fit great so glad i purchased.. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Shop Am

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Was slightly difficult to assemble but we figured it out. Fit on trampoline easily and works great. Adults and kids use it with no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy ladder
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy ladder. Pretty easy to put together. A little short for our 15 foot trampoline. We had to set some bricks under the foot of the ladder so it can set at an angle otherwise it was too straight up and down to be safe. Make sure to measure what you need then double check ladder dimensions. Even if product description states will fit with your trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Danidoty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Easy to assemble, seems sturdy, and a ton cheaper than the brand name to match. Who cares? It's a black ladder into a trampoline. I would not hesitate to recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Family est. 2006Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got a new trampoline for my grandbabies for Christmas and this is perfect to help them get up on it. Very well made and came very fast
customer_reviews.author: ReDonna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect If you like to swear and smashing things.
customer_reviews.text: There aren’t enough 4-letter words to describe my hatred for this piece of junk product. Easy assembly? Uh, no. I have never been so angry at a product in my life! The “easy” tabs and housing for them to “just slide” right in are terrible. This thing is junk and I’m not even sure if I will be able to use it by the time I finish trying to “easily slide” the step down. I might smash it into a billion pieces before I ever get to see if it works. Do not buy unless you like to cuss and smash stuff. Hate this POS.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It works great, hooks on great but the instructions for assembly ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, hooks on great but the instructions for assembly sucked! Royally sucked! It was totally useless as instructions and I basically had to just "fudge" my way through it by using the picture on the box. But still four stars as once assembled it is locked into place well and I jumped on each step to ensure that it was durable and safe before letting my kids use it. A real back saver since I no longer have to lift the younger kids on/off trampoline fifty times a day :)
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it just hooks over the outside rail of the trampoline. I don't know what else you could do to make it a better product and need to charge more for it. $18 for this and it took 5 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Barr

customer_reviews.title: Great product bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: Before you put this together lay out all thr parts and then glance at thr instructions. This is easy to put together but the instructions are incorrect so they're only useful as far as understanding the security wedges for the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewerrrr

customer_reviews.title: It also lifts out of the way to easily mow under and around
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! My daughter is a shorty so we always used a little slide sitting next to the trampoline for her to climb up. With this, we don't need the slide and I don't have to worry about the slide turning over as she climbs up or down. It also lifts out of the way to easily mow under and around.
customer_reviews.author: retired military

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and easy to install. I was a little nervous that it wasn't going to fit on our frame because the frame looked too big where it would connect to the ladder. The ladder part expands to fit the frame so all I had to do was press hard to get it to fit on the frame and then it snapped on and fit fine. My kids can.ow easily climb on and off the tramp with the ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Ragan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ladder, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: daughter can’t stop talking about this stupid ladder lol she loves it. It has wide steps so both my kids can go up and down. 2 and 4 years old. I’m very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Pilat

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for a low price! The perfect addition to our trampoline. Very sturdy and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Danielle Fekete

customer_reviews.title: So far this is a great ladder. We have had the kids (teens) over ...
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new ladder as the one we bought here from a local vendor about 5 years ago fell apart. So far this is a great ladder. We have had the kids (teens) over using it over and over and it is holding up better than the one we bought from our local vendor!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steffy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfect and much easier then climbing a chair into the trampoline lol. I read the other reviews about assembly, so i just looked at the picture on the box and put it together 😋. Done in about 10 minutes. Put the steps in same direction and then hook on the little pieces and voila!!
customer_reviews.author: Liana

customer_reviews.title: Good trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what I needed it for. Gave it 4 star because of the vague instruction on how to put it together
customer_reviews.author: iyke

customer_reviews.title: works great but was hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits on our tramp great. Only thing I don't like about it is it was difficult to put together. One of the steps didn't fit onto the pole properly and I had to keep jamming it down with my foot to get it on. The other one went on easily. Must have been a manufacture issue. Also, the bottom of the ladder has a foam cover on it, and I think it's going to get incredibly dirty sitting gone the muddy ground through rain and snow. Other than those two things, it fit great, and is easy for my kids to get on and off the trampoline now.
customer_reviews.author: LadyAmber

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe, rusts easily, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The ladder was impossible to fit correctly. The directions are not clear at all, and one side of the ladder would not allow the steps to attach fully. After one night of rain the metal part was rusted. This is not safe at all. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jplus4

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder seems to be an excellent replacement for my old one. The old one rusted after a couple of years, & this one seemed to be a better product, which it is. I had no problem assembling it, 7 it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Mazzeo

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit Skywalker Rectangular Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I have to return this item as it does not fit our Skywalker Rectangular Trampoline. The top clamps are too small to fit over the spring bar. It was difficult to understand the instructions so we just assembled it based on the large photo on the front and some interpretation of the instructions. It appears sturdy. The maximum weight capacity is 220 lb. Also, at 3 feet high, it is not long enough to angle away from the trampoline very far. I'm going to look for a replacement that is slightly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ladder
customer_reviews.text: Great length, kids can go into the trampoline in shoes or bare feet without an issue. Mounts to the trampoline easy enough and can be taken off if necessary. We just flip it up when we mow or move it and no reason to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Eward24

customer_reviews.title: Great little ladder and it makes it so easy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little ladder and it makes it so easy for my kids to jum in now. It's been 1 year and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend getting this product if you have a trampoline and smalled children are using it. Our youngest and his friends ruinned the net and we had to replace it because they kept grabbing onto the net to pull themselves up onto the trampoline. The steps fixed that problem!
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: Ladder was very easy to put together. The ladder itself is very study, my children are able to use it with ease. It does the job and gives me peace of mind that my children can get up and down safely from the trampoline. I had no issues attaching to trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: This fits perfect and is essential
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. I measured this before hand to make sure it fit. It’s very sturdy and fits perfect. Happy we purchased it. So much easier to get up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Haley McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline ladder!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I would have bought this sooner. Not only was it easy to assemble and install, its so easy to use and makes the trampoline more accessible and fun! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder; sturdy, stable; price is right!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a trampoline for my children. Although they are taller and older I still wanted them to have stable surface to get on and off of the trampoline with ( so I could have my step stool back in my kitchen!). I put this together myself in less than 15 minutes with no tools. Great ladder for the price. Very pleased. I bought this om Amazon because I did not see it in a store - shipped fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Guzzino

customer_reviews.title: So easy a 11 year old can do it.
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old grandson put it together for his trampoline and it’s sturdy easy to assemble and install obviously he is 11.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit jumpking trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Bought it because amazon recommended it as a package when I bought my trampoline, however it doesn’t fit to hook on the trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs uo
customer_reviews.text: Needed this!!! So much easier than propping up a chair and if you have a smaller kiddo you don’t want climbing up you can just flip it up (it’ll rotate around the trampoline bar) and the ladders isn’t accessible to toddlers anymore
customer_reviews.author: msrae

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this ladder. The only problem is when the kids get in or out and their weight is to one side of the ladder, one side may pop off the trampoline which is very dangerous. Overall okay product but make sure it's secured to the trampoline frame.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15 ft round trampoline that sits about 42 ish inches off the ground. I was hoping this would be the perfect height and it was. My 3 year old can now easily climb in and out of our trampoline without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement Ladder
customer_reviews.text: This fit on to our trampoline wonderfully. The ladder that came with our trampoline was damaged in a storm. This one is actually more sturdy, and the steps more comfortable to walk down.
customer_reviews.author: action0099

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder for our Trampoline
customer_reviews.text: This ladder really wasn't as hard to install as some of the reviews I read. Follow the instructions and you are good. Fit right up against our trampoline and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenai Cabo

customer_reviews.title: READ INSTRUCTIONS. Get extra stakes.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a 2 person job. Just read the instructions. Pretty sturdy for recommended weight. I bought a ladder and 4 extra stakes. I'm glad I did. Kids are happy! 6, 8 and 3
customer_reviews.author: KR Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Good. (Possibly too short for Skywalker 14x8 trampoline)
customer_reviews.text: Good construction A key trick (as in poorly described ) for assembly is to align the black plastic sleeves in the grooves _and_ rotated correctly (unlock facing out) to allow the step to slide down fully. Then rotate to lock position. (Reviewers who describe crooked steps didn't assemble it correctly.) Skywalker trampoline purchasers: I'm not sure I would not recommend for use with the Skywalker 14x8 trampoline; it's a little too short and hangs almost vertically. After jumping, if the ladder becomes more vertical, the hooks get loose and could possibly come off the trampoline. Bricks under the bottom rung and heavy-duty zip ties holding the hooks on (photo) seems to help.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Maru

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our trampoline! Makes it so much easier for the kids to safety get up and down from the trampoline. Easy to assembly and good quality! We have a Propel 15' Trampoline and it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: The kids have an easy time climbing up and down this to get onto our trampoline. My 7-year-old is a pro at it now. It's comfortable to climb barefoot. The only thing I don't like about it is that once the jumping starts and the trampoline moves a little (it's on a concrete basketball court), the ladder sometimes gets crooked and I'm afraid of it falling while a kid is getting down. You still need to watch your kids while they bounce, and it might even be better if secure with screws to the trampoline itself.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: fits perfect, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect, easy to assemble, but make sure you follow the directions. Super easy to assemble but if you do not do it in the exact order you are supposed to you will get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Borboa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Got a new trampoline for the kids and the littles needed a bit of help getting up on the edge. This has been awesome - super easy to put together and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: MaxandRob

customer_reviews.title: Universal for most trampolines and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as shown and goes together easily and installs easily and securely! My 3 year old was using it and hanging on it within minutes of delivery because of how easy it was to put together and install!
customer_reviews.author: Casia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have young children! Once my 3 year old learned to hold on and how to properly go up and down.. it became a much safer hassle free solution to getting on and off the trampoline. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: TeriDee

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is universal - it fit on our trampoline perfect! My 2 year old can easily climb up and down it to get on and off the trampoline and I don’t have to worry about him falling.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Withstands the outdoor elements well and is made of good quality materials. I have had this for about a year and it still looks great! No rust or issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Keith

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for our trampoline. Easy to put together and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Harpers

customer_reviews.title: Makes it very easy for the kiddos
customer_reviews.text: truly appreciate the "flat" steps. Makes it very easy for the kiddos. Any parent or grandparent who has every used or owned a trampoline ladder with "round rungs" will understand this next statement: "...and I don't think about them slipping on the rung and getting high-centered or falling" as easily.
customer_reviews.author: sal

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed because the product came with only 4 of the 6 parts needed to put it together. I originally thought that the price was too high, but we needed them, so I splurged and went ahead and purchased. However, the fact that we can't even use it because more than half of the parts are missing is really a shame. Not even worth 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Lovin' my kids

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hard to assemble. Once together it mounted fine and has not shifted at all. Easily lifts up out of the way for mowing of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: deathknight8338

customer_reviews.title: Works great....
customer_reviews.text: It works great with the Skywalker 12ft trampoline that we bought my grandson for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: naenae

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love the wide steps - it makes it so much easier for my child to get on and off the trampoline. It doesn't hurt your feet either, like some of the ones that have skinny bars for steps. Very sturdy, great quality. There was one part of the directions that was a little confusing, but other than that, we didn't have any trouble. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kori81

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great for trampoline. Have also used it for a quick fix for the boat and it works amazing. Very sturdy. My almost 300 lbs brother in law used it with no issue
customer_reviews.author: mOmMaViNsOn

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like it and definitely looks better than a chair. It is kind of steep but doesn’t bother anyone
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad ladder
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ladder but a pain in the butt to put together. And instructions were like mud! And my bottom foam cover tore when putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Adair

customer_reviews.title: Easy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and overall good sturdy product. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Lightweight but sturdy. Fit our 15' trampoline well. Kids say it's great and makes getting on and off the trampoline a lot easier. My husband installed it close to the pole so the kids have something to hold on to. Even our three year old can get up and down on his own. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Got my six-year-old a trampoline for Christmas, this is a perfect addition to help her get on and off of it safely
customer_reviews.author: J-ME In AZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and clip and off on our trampoline. Our daughter is 3 and she can get up and down just fine by herself.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna Castro

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not Easy
customer_reviews.text: This was not easy to put together and instructions were not easy to follow. My husband literally had to bang it together just for it to snap into place.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest C. Jones III

customer_reviews.title: Great Trampoline Ladder!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to go with our 10ft Skywalker Trampoline! It fits perfect and makes it easy to get in and out of the trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: i<3MyPet

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you have a trampoline, it is a no-brainer...buy one. You can't go wrong for the money. Not sure why the trampoline does not come with it's own ladder, so an aftermarket ladder is a must. Probably saved multiple injuries getting on and off the trampoline. On another note, please don't use your trampoline without a net...you are just asking for a serious injury.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a sold easy item to install. I was worried at first about the strength but after stepping on it it support me without even a bend. So I knew the kids would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sherael K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Had it up for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my new trampoline, which is larger and higher from the ground. Works great so far! My kids are happy too ;)
customer_reviews.author: AlanTX

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I was worried about the quality due to the low price, but it’s great! Safe and easy for my kids to use. Easy to put together and attach.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Directions cause me to waste a lot of time doing the wrong thing so ...
customer_reviews.text: Ladder works well just took a lot of time to figure out how to assemble since the directions were completely misleading. Directions cause me to waste a lot of time doing the wrong thing so that's why I took off onestar. After I finally figured it out decided to post this video to help others out hopefully. As I couldn't find a YouTube video out there. Manufacturers post a 2-minute video to help everyone out and assembly and save a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! My son’s 14’ JumpKing trampoline did not come with a ladder. This ladder was easy to assemble and attach, in all it took around 5 minutes, and it pops right on to the rail. So much easier to access the trampoline now!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off for moving, wide steps for foot comfort and easy to put together. It's just what I wanted, but it does also come apart fairly easily. My neighbor has one that's basically metal rungs and I didn't like it nearly as much.
customer_reviews.author: eejtalk

customer_reviews.title: Must have for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! We have 4 kids ranging from 12-2. This product is so great for the little kids to help them get on and off the tramp safely. Strongly recommend to any trampoline owners with kids. I use it as well. My in laws bought one for their trampoline for the grandkids and are happy with their purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit for the trampoline. Simple to assemble (15minutes). Material is durable and holds weight properly when getting up and down. Great for the kids to have a ladder to get up and down instead of trying to climb on and jump off. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great for price!
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to put together, as the instructions are blurry. I watched a youtube video that helped. Other than that, it works great for our trampoline. The 2 1/2 yo has a little trouble getting up the steps but the 4, 8, 11yo all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This item worked exactly how it said it was however I was still surprised by how sturdy and excellent it fit
customer_reviews.author: kj11

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this step a while now, it was such a great order. High quality for price, the whole family uses this ladder and it is so sturdy. Every trampoline should have this ladder!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline ladder
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchased. Makes getting into our trampoline much easier for our 5 year old daughter. Feels sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Quinn

product_meta.title: Pure Fun Wide 2-Step Universal Trampoline Ladder
product_meta.description: The Pure Fun Trampoline Ladder helps you climb aboard your trampoline more easily than ever before! Made from UV Resistant, galvanized steel, this ladder is built to withstand years of rain and weather exposure. It is easily removable so you are able to monitor when your kids are jumping on the trampoline! The Pure Fun Ladder measures 38" high and fits on trampolines with a round frame up to 3", making it the perfect universal fit for most outdoor trampolines. Made with large, flat textured steps for sturdiness and a rubber coated bottom to prevent slipping while getting on and off your trampoline. This ladder is ASTM, TUV/GS and CE Certified and safety rated up to 220 lbs. Make our jumping experience safer today with a Pure Fun Trampoline Ladder!
feature_bullets: Flat, textured steps prevent slipping while climbing onto the trampoline
Designed to fit on most outdoor trampolines with up to 3" round frame
Non-permanent top hook design for easy installation and removal
Constructed with galvanized UV resistant steel, which makes it safe to leave outdoors for extended periods of time.
